# Government Tender Announcement

## Title and References

*   **Tender Title**: MAXIMO System Configuration Changes
*   **Solicitation Number**: 21120-24-4242746
*   **Reference Number**: 21120-24-4242746

## Tender Overview

The Correctional Service Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under procurement category SRV. The requirement is for a contractor that can perform software configuration changes based on updated business processes, develop training materials, and implement new data management for building condition reports.

## Key Requirements

*   The contractor must have experience with the IBM MAXIMO CMMS system.
*   The work involves developing training materials, implementing new data management for building condition reports, and completing software configuration changes.
*   The contractor will need to work with data already established by Correctional Service Canada.

## Evaluation Criteria

The RFP will be evaluated based on the lowest cost-per-point.

## Procurement Method

The procurement method is competitive, with selective tendering.

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-UK Continental Agreement (CUKTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPanFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

## Bidding Details

The bidding opportunity is open to qualified TBIPS suppliers who have met the Tier 1 qualification criteria for services in the National Capital Region.

## Evaluation and Award Process

The proposal evaluation will be conducted by a team of evaluators who will assess the proposals based on the evaluation criteria.

## Contact Information

*   **Contracting Authority**: Jason St-Onge
*   **Phone Number**: (506) 269-3765
*   **Email Address**: jason.st-onge@csc-scc.gc.ca

## Important Notes

*   Bidders are advised that "Buy and Sell.GC.CA" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.
*   The RFP documents will be emailed directly
